title: Bets, Ray J, FL Blackface Story, Parenting Differences, Mary Jane Story, Big Game Snacks, Closing Remarks and more.
itunes:title: Bets, Ray J, FL Blackface Story, Parenting Differences, Mary Jane Story, Big Game Snacks, Closing Remarks and more.
description:
The Church is open today in the opening.  The crew talk about prop bets during the Big Game.  Ray J makes money move with his Scoot-E-Bike.  Blackface comes back to haunt the Florida Secretary of State.  Should you raise males differently than females.  The parenting debate is on.  CBS has banned all ads containing cannabis and medical marijuana for the Big Game.  Frito Lay has drawn some interesting conclusions regarding snacking during the Big Game.  Closing Remarks today, covers "asking" and much more.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
